statements: SELECT * FROM certifications;
SELECT certification_name, required_experience FROM certifications ORDER BY required_experience DESC;
SELECT certification_name, certification_authority FROM certifications WHERE required_experience > 5;
SELECT * FROM certifications WHERE certification_authority = 'Oracle';
SELECT certification_name, required_experience FROM certifications WHERE required_experience BETWEEN 3 AND 7;
SELECT certification_id, certification_name, required_experience, certification_authority FROM certifications;
SELECT certification_name, required_experience FROM certifications WHERE required_experience > 5;
SELECT * FROM certifications WHERE certification_authority = 'Microsoft';
SELECT * FROM certifications ORDER BY certification_id DESC;
SELECT certification_name, required_experience FROM certifications WHERE required_experience < 10 ORDER BY required_experience ASC;
SELECT * FROM certifications;
SELECT name, description FROM certifications WHERE category='IT';
SELECT id, name, level FROM qualifications ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM certifications WHERE category='Finance' OR category='Healthcare';
SELECT name, level FROM qualifications WHERE certification_id='XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX';
SELECT * FROM certifications WHERE category = 'Technology';
SELECT name, category FROM certifications WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT id, description FROM certifications WHERE name = 'AWS Certified Solutions Architect';
SELECT * FROM qualifications WHERE level > 3 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, level FROM qualifications WHERE certification_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM certifications;
SELECT id, name FROM certifications WHERE description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT id, qualification_name, level FROM qualifications ORDER BY level DESC;
SELECT certification_id, qualification_id FROM career_advancement WHERE employee_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT name, qualification_name FROM certifications c JOIN qualifications q ON c.id = q.id;
SELECT * FROM certifications WHERE name = 'Java Certification';
SELECT id, name FROM certifications WHERE id = 'fbf6f93e-8b46-4b2c-85d0-7c0b8885d20d';
SELECT * FROM qualifications WHERE level > 2;
SELECT id, qualification_name FROM qualifications WHERE level < 4;
SELECT certifications.name, qualifications.qualification_name FROM certifications JOIN qualifications ON certifications.id = qualifications.id;
SELECT * FROM certifications;
SELECT certification_name, required_experience_years FROM certifications ORDER BY required_experience_years DESC;
SELECT employee_id, certification_id, date_achieved FROM employee_certifications WHERE employee_id = 123;
SELECT qualification_name, qualification_description FROM qualifications WHERE qualification_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT certification_id, certification_name FROM certifications WHERE required_experience_years >= 2;
SELECT certification_name, required_experience_years FROM certifications
SELECT employee_id, certification_id, date_achieved FROM employee_certifications ORDER BY date_achieved DESC
SELECT qualification_name, qualification_description FROM qualifications WHERE qualification_id = 2
SELECT * FROM employee_qualifications WHERE employee_id = 1001 AND expiration_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT employee_id, qualification_name, expiration_date FROM employee_qualifications JOIN qualifications ON employee_qualifications.qualification_id = qualifications.qualification_id
SELECT * FROM certifications;
SELECT certification_name, required_experience FROM certifications WHERE required_experience > 2;
SELECT employee_name, employee_role FROM employees ORDER BY employee_name ASC;
SELECT course_name, course_duration FROM courses WHERE course_duration < 30 ORDER BY course_duration DESC;
SELECT position_title, minimum_experience FROM job_positions WHERE minimum_experience >= 5;
SELECT * FROM certifications;
SELECT certification_name, required_experience FROM certifications WHERE required_experience > 2;

SELECT employee_name, certification_name FROM employees JOIN certifications ON employee_certifications.certification_id = certifications.certification_id JOIN employees ON employee_certifications.employee_id = employees.employee_id;
SELECT course_name, certification_name FROM courses JOIN certifications ON courses.certification_id = certifications.certification_id;

SELECT position_title, employee_name FROM job_positions JOIN employees ON job_positions.required_certification_id = employees.certification_id JOIN employees ON job_positions.required_certification_id = certifications.certification_id;
